quotes.quote: “What really knocks me out is a book that, when you're all done reading it, you wish the author that wrote it was a terrific friend of yours and you could call him up on the phone whenever you felt like it. That doesn't happen much, though.”
quotes.author: J.D. Salinger

quotes.quote: “A writer is someone for whom writing is more difficult than it is for other people.”
quotes.author: Thomas Mann

quotes.quote: “All good books are alike in that they are truer than if they had really happened and after you are finished reading one you will feel that all that happened to you and afterwards it all belongs to you: the good and the bad, the ecstasy, the remorse and sorrow, the people and the places and how the weather was. If you can get so that you can give that to people, then you are a writer.”
quotes.author: Ernest Hemingway

quotes.quote: “I've got the key to my castle in the air, but whether I can unlock the door remains to be seen.”
quotes.author: Louisa May Alcott

quotes.quote: “A good novel tells us the truth about its hero; but a bad novel tells us the truth about its author.”
quotes.author: G.K. Chesterton

quotes.quote: “If you have a dream, don’t just sit there. Gather courage to believe that you can succeed and leave no stone unturned to make it a reality.”
quotes.author: Dr Roopleen

quotes.quote: A rose by any other name would smell as sweet.
quotes.author: William Shakespeare

quotes.quote: All the world’s a stage, and all the men and women merely players.
quotes.author: William Shakespeare

quotes.quote: Ask not what your country can do for you; ask what you can do for your country.
quotes.author: John Kennedy

quotes.quote: Genius is one percent inspiration and ninety-nine percent perspiration.
quotes.author: Thomas Edison

quotes.quote: I have a dream that my four little children will one day live in a nation where they will not be judged by the color of their skin but by the content of their character.
quotes.author: Martin Luther King

quotes.quote: If you are going through hell, keep going.
quotes.author: Winston Churchill

quotes.quote: The purpose of our lives is to be happy.
quotes.author: Dalai Lama

quotes.quote: Many of life’s failures are people who did not realize how close they were to success when they gave up
quotes.author: Thomas A. Edison

quotes.quote: Never let the fear of striking out keep you from playing the game.
quotes.author: Babe Ruth
